name: Apple iPhone 13
description: The iPhone 13 features a new A15 Bionic chip, 5G connectivity, and a Super Retina XDR display.

name: Samsung Galaxy S22
description: The Galaxy S22 features a new Exynos processor, 5G connectivity, and a Dynamic AMOLED 2X display.

name: Sony PlayStation 5
description: The PlayStation 5 features a new custom AMD Zen 2 processor, 4K UHD Blu-ray drive, and support for ray tracing.

name: Amazon Echo (4th Generation)
description: The Echo (4th Generation) features a new spherical design, improved sound quality, and built-in Zigbee hub.

name: Nike Air Zoom Pegasus 38
description: The Air Zoom Pegasus 38 features a Zoom Air unit in the forefoot and a lightweight upper for a comfortable and responsive ride.

name: GoPro HERO10 Black
description: The HERO10 Black features a new GP2 processor, 5.3K video recording, and improved stabilization.

name: Samsung 55-Inch QLED Q70A
description: The Q70A QLED TV features Quantum Dot technology, 4K Ultra HD resolution, and Object Tracking Sound.

name: Bose QuietComfort 35 II
description: The QuietComfort 35 II features active noise cancellation, Alexa and Google Assistant integration, and up to 20 hours of battery life.
